thread.title: Bikes take to Bardstown Road for CycLOUvia
thread.title_full: Bikes take to Bardstown Road for CycLOUvia

author: courier-journal.com
title: Bikes take to Bardstown Road for CycLOUvia
text:
Bikes bound down Bardstown Road today for the fourth CycLOUvia, an event Louisville’s open streets program organizes to promote healthy lifestyles, alternative transportation, bike/pedestrian safety and economic development.
Bardstown Road and other roads in and near the Highlands will be closed from 2 to 6 p.m. Sunday.
See how your fellow Louisvillians are taking advantage of the opportunity to experience Louisville by walking, cycling, skateboarding or dancing along infrastructure that is always there, but rarely prioritized for people.
Post by TheDiaperFairyCottage . Louisville shuts down one of its busier roads. #Cyclouvia pic.twitter.com/5d6gFnxPIT
— Timothy Chilton (@geddyrulz) October 18, 2015 Post by MayorGregFischer . #Detours for @CycLOUvia are from 1:30p to 6:30p. http://t.co/ZlbInu0TZ5 #RiderAlert pic.twitter.com/wLNGOLRBpW
— TARC (@ridetarc) October 18, 2015 CycLouvia Sunday, too. Might as well keep your cars far away from the Highlands this weekend.
— BarMitzvah'dWerewolf (@byronshero) October 16, 2015 Below is a full list of road closures from WHAS.
Bardstown Road from Douglass Boulevard to Highland Avenue Baxter Avenue from Highland Avenue to Breckenridge Street Crossover traffic at Bardstown Road/Eastern Parkway & Bardstown Road/Grinstead Drive Facebook | @CycLOUvia
It's a great day to open the street. See you ...
